mapper.insert: insert into user(id, password, name, dept, position, phone, email, address) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{dept}, #{position}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address})
mapper.update: update authorities set authorities=#{authorities} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select u.id as username, u.password, u.enabled, u.name , u.position, a.authorities as authority from user u, authority a where u.id=#{username} group by u.id
